name: Sasquatch Mountain Resort
description: Our natural powder-packed bowl tucked in the mountains of the Fraser Valley provides unmatched quality for skiers and riders of all abilities. Discover a vast range of dynamic terrain from cruisy beginner runs to steep downhill drops and off-piste gullies at Sasquatch Mountain Resort. Conveniently located an hour from Abbotsford, 2 hours from Vancouver and 3 hours from Seattle, were the perfect ski destination for the whole family to explore and enjoy!
